question: Who has been selected as the Chairman of the Ram Temple Complex Development Committee?
explanation:
Nripendra Misra, the former principal secretary to Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been selected as the chairman of the Ram Temple Complex Development Committee.
Ram Janmabhoomi Nyas chief Nritya Gopal Das has been named as the Chairman of the Sri Ram Janambhoomi Teerth Kshetra Trust.
